meaning list.sentence translation: Kunzima ukuhambisana nabo bonke ubuchwepheshe obusha.

meaning list.sentence: The teacher laid into the student for not completing the assignment.
meaning list.sentence translation: Uthisha uthethise umfundi ngokungawenzi umsebenzi wesikole.

meaning list.sentence: The rain didn’t let up all day.
He didn’t let up until the project was complete.
meaning list.sentence translation: Akazange athathe ikhefu kuze kuqedwe umsebenzi.

meaning list.sentence: He lived off his savings for several months.
He looks down on people who don’t have a degree.
She looked him up and down before speaking.
We passed through a small town on our way to the mountains.
He passed through the city for a conference.
The media played up the risks of the new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: Abezindaba benza ihaba ngezingozi zobuchwepheshe obusha.

meaning list.sentence: My back has been playing up again.
meaning list.sentence translation: Umhlane wami waqala ukubangela izinkinga futhi.

meaning list.sentence: She popped in to say hello on her way to work.
Despite the challenges, they pushed ahead with their plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: Naphezu kobunzima, baqhubekile nokuqhubekela phambili necebo labo.

meaning list.sentence: Someone ran off with her bag while she wasn’t looking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Engakabheki, omunye wantshontsha isikhwama sakhe wabaleka.

meaning list.sentence: They set off on their trip early in the morning.
The venue was set up for the wedding reception.
We had to sit through a very boring lecture.
True friends will always stick by you.

meaning list.meaning: Ukuqala ukuchitha isikhathi nento ethile noma othile
meaning list.sentence: She took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ngemva kokuthuthela edolobheni, waqala ukuchitha isikhathi neqembu elisha labangane.
